comment.text: The "CSPInputPlaceholder" translation key is used to display a placeholder message that instructs users to enter a URL in a specific format. This placeholder appears as a text input field in the UI, likely in a dialog or settings page where users configure their Content Security Policy (CSP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, 'قم بإدخال' is a bit formal. A more natural phrasing would be 'أدخل' or 'ضع رابط'.

The translation 'URL'yi bu cür daxil edin: https://example.com' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Enter URL like this: https://example.com'. It uses a slightly awkward phrasing in Azerbaijani. The term 'cür' is not commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as 'URL-i belə daxil edin: https://example.com' or 'URL-ü aşağıdakı kimi daxil edin: https://example.com'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'URL-i' is technically correct, 'URL-ü' is generally preferred as the definite accusative suffix for URLs.

The translation 'Inserisci l'URL come: https://example.com' is literal and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase. A more natural translation would be 'Inserisci un URL come questo: https://example.com' or 'Immetti un URL come questo: https://example.com'. 'Come questo' is more common than 'come'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Inserisci un URL come questo: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon and space after '次のように' could be improved for better readability. It feels a bit abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URLを次のように入力してください： https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vietrādi' is not the correct translation for 'like this' in this context. It implies a reciprocal or equivalent relationship, which isn't intended here. 'Kā šādi' or 'Šādi' would be more appropriate.
The Romanian translation includes a space before the URL 'https://example.com'. While not strictly incorrect, it deviates from the English original's formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the URL: Introduceți URL-ul în felul următor: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙවැනි ඒ.ස.නි. යොදන්න: https://example.com' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Enter URL like this: https://example.com'. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' is an abbreviation for 'URL' and while understandable, it's less common and could be confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දේශනයක් මෙවැනි ආකාරයට ඇතුළත් කරන්න: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, adding a colon and space after 'ඇතුළත් කරන්න' would improve readability and better mirror the English phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දේශනයක් මෙවැනි ආකාරයට ඇතුළත් කරන්න: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'nasledovne' feels slightly awkward in this context. While grammatically correct, it breaks the flow a little. It's a more formal way of saying it than necessary.

The translation 'Vnesite URL kot v primeru: https://example.com' is a literal translation but not the most natural way to express this in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Vnesite URL v tem formatu: https://example.com' or 'Vnesite URL tako kot v primeru: https://example.com'. The phrase 'kot v primeru' can sound slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vnesite URL v tem formatu: https://example.com

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "输入同类格式的链接 URL" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Enter URL like this: https://example.com". It's overly literal and slightly awkward.
The colon and space after “URL” in the Chinese translation is unnecessary and can be removed.
